name: The Skinwalkers
description:
The Skinwalkers is an ambient focused retro styled horror game. (Not related to the skinwalker creppy pasta)

You supposed to meet with your fiends in a camp but they were not there. You adventure deep into the forest to look for them but something is not right.

Discord server: https://discord.gg/jKXvXyTzYn

I also got a twitch channel where I sometimes stream game development feel free to check it out: https://www.twitch.tv/v0lt13
